PORTUGAL is Trade Gothic Bold Condensed:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070312013318/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-condensed-no-20/)
